attributes.action: Give a vote of no confidence to Alistair Darling and ask him to step down as Chancellor
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the recent events where potentially half of the country's population has had their details exposed to any unauthorised persons, i propose that the Prime Minister passes a vote of no confidence in the ability of Alistair Darling to perform his duty as Chancellor. His failure to accept overall responibility for the matter in contrast to the head of HRMC Mr Gray resigning shows that he is not suitable to handle his position.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
